Desc.entry: Facilities include astro-turf pitches, badminton, basketball, boxercise, cricket nets, football (indoor and floodlit outdoor), gymnastics, netball, tennis (indoor and outdoor), trampoline and volleyball. Organises special events and coaching courses. The centre is available for other activities and is keen to attract block bookings from clubs. Run by Interserve.

ContactName.entry: Nathan Reid, Assistant Facility Manager Community and Leisure/Stephen Little, Leisure Supervisor

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Fri 6-10pm, Sat 10am-1pm, other times on request
